website_summaries.verdict: A hand-powered, heavy-duty metal grinder w/multiple functions (grinds pepper, salt, spices). An ornate yet functional conversation piece for the kitchen/dining room.
pros: The metal is solid and sturdy, not flimsy or cheap-looking
cons: Some owners say it's too small
In particular, the spice intake is quite tiny

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Toy, Not a Grinder
customer_reviews.text: The fill-hole is only 1/4 of an inch wide! It’s not wide enough for a single all-spice seed to fit in. Good luck trying to fill this thing with peppercorns, as there is no funnel known to man that is tiny enough to insert into its quarter inch wide fill-hole. Gear mechanism is wobbly. Total trash. I am returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: albert cipriani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice , works well, rather pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It is a bit small for my hand and stiff to turn but makes a lot of pepper quickly that can be collected in the base. I followed the easy directions on YouTube on adjusting the grind. Cute product, a bit noisy to use as it is a grinder. For someone who wants fairly large amounts of nicely ground pepper quickly it is great. The filling opening does not accept allspice due to size.
customer_reviews.author: Zceska

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is very beautiful and has a classic design. Moreover, it is actually very functional at grinding spices, so it's not merely a nicely designed piece of art. So far, I have successfully grinded: black pepper, sea salt, and coriander. This grinder is pretty small in size, but I am very happy with it. If they get a bigger size, I will also go ahead and get that one, too, so I can have multiple sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Q.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought another from another company and it was just an extremely poor copy of the real kind. This Anatolia gizmo is very cute, and it works great. I liked the quality a lot because I had a point of comparison with another one I bought. Overall is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roudemus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and beautiful grinder!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new pepper grinder. I was worried about the reviews that reported it is small and, while petite, the peppercorns have lasted quite a while without refill. It is really a beautiful and effective grinder!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie N.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with
customer_reviews.text: O.k., so I bought it when I had a need and I haven't had a need since! Well, it's there for next time and it's very attractive in the kitchen. Happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Grinder For The Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little price performer. I like the small size and the fact that it looks nice sitting out on my counter top. I’ve only had it for a few weeks, but it’s done an adequate job grinding salt crystals for me. I’m sure that a larger, heavier model would be more efficient, but I’m happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the antique and silver look are great and is a nostalgic what-not.
customer_reviews.text: I's ok but since we dry the large hot peppers from the garden and often mix other herbs together for a blend it just wasn't as large as I thought it would be and not as fast as i wanted. I can only process a small amount at a time maybe for a meal. But still very enjoyable product!
customer_reviews.author: the fix it man

customer_reviews.title: Hard to turn the crank and adjust grind size
customer_reviews.text: Just hard to turn the crank. Holds only perhaps two tablespoons of salt. Got ready to return it....no returns. Dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: boyd1477

customer_reviews.title: Best to pay attention to its size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to grind small amounts of spices. It is really well made and has a solid feel. It is also really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Marham

customer_reviews.title: I like it`s look.
customer_reviews.text: The order was delivered fast for international shipment. It nice looking grinder. I bought it because it look like antique one and does not cost a lot. I like it even bottom part does not locked to the grinder. You need to hold it with your hand to make sure it did not felt off while you grinding. But it is ok with me whole grinder easily fit in to my hand. It do it`s job and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: It is beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new peopermill! It is so unique looking and durable. It holds my peppercorns in the bottom for easy refill or if I want the whole peppercorn.
customer_reviews.author: April L. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty on the table
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but work intensive to get into & get ground pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Bekki Booth

customer_reviews.title: Pepper Grinder
customer_reviews.text: We like the design & style, it’s a good conversation piece too!
customer_reviews.author: J Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: So far,so good
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Its not a big pepper mill but small and cute, looks good on the kitchen counter top. The only issue is, its not easy to disassemble the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handheld Spice Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Received my two spice grinders yesterday, they are sturdy, great quality and easy to use to keep fresh ground spices on hand for cooking and for setting at the table for guests to use. Thank you for the great, speedy service. I would love to know what other products you sell
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Nice small pepper grinder
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, Nice small pepper grinder, grinds quite well, uniform even grind not too large. Would buy here again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return. Does not grind at all. Very pretty to look at though.
customer_reviews.author: David Medellin jr

customer_reviews.title: Good grinder. Quite easy to turn once it gets ...
customer_reviews.text: Good grinder. Quite easy to turn once it gets going, and it grinds well. I do wish there was a better way to put items into it. As far as I've found, the only two ways are to use the small door at the top (it really is quite small) or take the whole grinder apart, which requires a wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Attractive ginder.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive grinder, we are using it for Himalyan pink salt. It is a little tough to turn but that may be because it is new.
customer_reviews.author: jvj1970

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty, but after you grind the pepper it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty, but after you grind the pepper it comes out the same place you put it corns in. It's a nice table piece.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It grinds the coffee and looks good! Can't ask for much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My only disappoinment is I didn't read the size of grinder. Smaller than what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: sassyforever

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: There were no surprises once we received this product, accurate measurements and pictures are provided in the description. The company initially shipped us the wrong item, but that was eventually sorted out... Other than that, we are completely satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Very small, constantly having to refill them !
customer_reviews.text: To small , constantly having to refill them , but they do work great ,, just wish they was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: James Thomas

customer_reviews.title: it's beautiful and well crafted
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped it would grind finer. Fine tuning the grind has been a challenge. Maybe I haven't discovered all the nuances. A set of instructions would be good
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful workmanship
customer_reviews.text: really pretty, would think it was an antique except for the ISO stamp on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: A CT Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece to have sitting on our kitchen counter
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece to have sitting on our kitchen counter. It took a long time to ship to us, however, so keep that in mind before ordering. We're unsure of where the pepper comes out when it grinds, but having it on display is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this product thinking the handle would be easier for my hands to turn. It is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecile Holmen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, cheaply priced. Delivers little
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, cheaply priced. The hatch to put the pepper in easily opens in use. The handle is shorter than expected, and it easily jams. Other than not really being useable, it looks good. Coarse salt just jams it, despite easing the nut that allows for a coarser grind. And Himalayan salt grains resist movement with the limited torque the short handle can deliver. Peppercorns are easier to grind, but the short handle makes it harder than it should be. Good luck shoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Solderer

customer_reviews.title: Good petite spice grinder
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it long enough to say what the durability is. I was looking for something that would grind pepper catkins. Good so far ! Super cute and customer service is attentive....
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sundean

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 spice grinders for a class I was going to teach. They arrived just in time and just when they said the grinders would arrive. They are heavy duty and you can use them for hard spices and coffee, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: janie greenwald

customer_reviews.title: Great for crushing Star Anise
customer_reviews.text: Small but works as designed. Great for crushing Star Anise.
customer_reviews.author: BaileysLilSista

customer_reviews.title: Hard to grind and doesn't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: When I use this, the opening for loading it with peppercorns comes open almost immediately. Additionally, the handle is too short to use easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grinds other seeds besides peppercorns
customer_reviews.text: I tried it with mustard seeds & broccoli seeds separately. The adjust-grind feature allows to a medium grit.
customer_reviews.author: ptrbrn

customer_reviews.title: Very cute little grinder!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little grinder! It is decorative and it looks good as well!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but it did a very good job on some peppercorns.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty item, happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, exactly as pictured! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: yasmin vh

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder
customer_reviews.text: I love this grinder. Quality is good and feels sturdy. The only thing I wish was that it came with a mini spoon or funnel to place herbs into small hole. That's easy enough to find on your own though.
customer_reviews.author: Hdail

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful but pretty much useless. It doesn’t grind well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Moez Dawad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice and use on our table when we have ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect choice and use on our table when we have exotic dinners.. Try putting Sichuan " pepper" in it and enjoy the lovely aroma when people grind it on their plates.
customer_reviews.author: LaDorna

customer_reviews.title: turkish coffee grinder
customer_reviews.text: scheduled to arrive in 3+ weeks it did arrive on date. works and looks great. would order from Bazaaranatolia again for authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a bit on the small side, but ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit on the small side, but very solidly made, and I believe it will be a household staple for many a years!
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: After a minor shipping problem, the delivery was completed satisfactorily. We are very happy with the product. It is beautiful and functional at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph V. Souza, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Classic design and well-organized !
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my uncle, my cousin . They all like its design ! So classic. But you have to clean it 1st , b/c it has some crumb of irons.
customer_reviews.author: Viet Ha

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and very decorative works well also I would recommend it to anyone exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its really nice it grinding coffee beans really fine. I Love it
customer_reviews.author: Debby romero

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this grinder
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this grinder. I got it for a friend and he loves it. The detail is so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Jew

customer_reviews.title: perfect grinder
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality, great grinder for the price it can't be beat..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fun gift to give that is out of the ordinary and very ornamental and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Loewecke

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This grinder grinds into a small compartment that you remove from the bottom. While it did gring the pepper we wanted to grind, it produce more of a cracked pepper than a ground pepper. We’re going to keep it around for grinding spices like cloves for marinades and brines, but it isn’t really suitable for table use.
customer_reviews.author: Unamanic

customer_reviews.title: the chamber for the seeds and beans is very small ...
customer_reviews.text: the chamber for the seeds and beans is very small half the size of the top chamber shown. if they were to show a photo of the insides no one would buy it. I bought it for a pepper mill but because of how minuscule the storage chamber is I'd have to fill it up every other day.
customer_reviews.author: joe pc

customer_reviews.title: ̈ IT WON'T GRIND  ̈
customer_reviews.text: looks nice but ̈ IT WON'T GRIND  ̈ ones I poor the half of tea spoon of salt in it (can't hold anymore) .it will get stacked and won't grind :( I will have to use it as a decorative piece :/
customer_reviews.author: GretaR

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it works for certain things. Pumpkin seeds not being one of them.
customer_reviews.text: One star for beauty, one for being Turkish. I tried to grind pumpkin seeds and it worked once. Then it quit working. Defective product? I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is very good junk, but it's still junk
customer_reviews.text: This is very good junk, but it's still junk. It's cheap, but worthless. Kind of pretty. Buy a good mortar and pestle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Nice look but not really functional. Tiny little thing but if you consider that the bottom third is only a cap, you are left with about an inch of functional grinder.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, performs bad.
customer_reviews.text: Rough, sloppy movement. Looks nice but that's it. Takes more effort than should be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Slow Reader

customer_reviews.title: and she loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I gave it to a friend as a gift, and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my grinder!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this grinder! It grinds my pepper to perfection and looks beautiful sitting on the table!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ryland

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: After close inspection of the grinder I found very good workmanship. It has seams on the cylinder but are completely non existent on the interior of the Grinder. The "Catch Cup" on the bottom removes very easily, operates/grinds very well. And at a extremely reasonable price. Received an email Thanking me for the order, and links for any questions and feedback. Received another after the Grinders arrived, with links if there are any questions or problems, so The Manufacturer get's another Five Stars for customer concern.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Small but wonderful
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I anticipated. Probabky holds about 1/4 c or less of peppercorns but grinds them coarse to fine. I'm the only one that uses pepper in my house and I like it super fine so this will take awhile to need to refill. It refills through a slider in the top which is nice to not have to take it apart to refill like grinders I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to Make Lavender Pepper
customer_reviews.text: I have used the mill to grind a mixture of white and black peppercorns along with sea salt and lavender. My original purpose was not as successful as I hoped. The mill was hard to grind the large peppercorns and the lavender did not grind very well. However, I think I will use the mill for table use to serve coarsely ground black pepper because it is such a pretty mill.
customer_reviews.author: Debkcon

customer_reviews.title: like how it is mde and the size is good
customer_reviews.text: added your item to a gift basket for housewarming (apartment warming) i was looking for the extra piece to sparkle and your spice grinder was what i needed to finish my basket a modern kitchen love the emboss finish it was given to the person who was so happy to fine the extra add on to her gift that she was not expecting .
customer_reviews.author: LOLA

customer_reviews.title: Say no to plastic
customer_reviews.text: It was important for us to not add another plastic item to our home. The only other one we found was 30 dollars at William and Sonoma, which I'm sure is of great quality. We are happy with this one. That is not to say this item is ethically produced at all stages. I cant comment on that. Its beautiful and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: suri

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grind fluidly
customer_reviews.text: The grinder is cute, but it's very small and the handle doesn't turn fluidly. One recipe I made came out horribly spicy because I wasn't aware so many pepper kernels had come out because of the way this grinds. plus the bottom comes off and it doesn't go back on easily so it's clumsy. I am going to keep it, but I feel it's not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: CD Shop

customer_reviews.title: Sigh. No, I'm afraid not.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this pepper grinder. I liked the idea of supporting a small venture in Turkey. Unfortunately, this isn't a good way to do it. The grinder is poorly designed, crudely made, difficult to fill, difficult to crank, and a general pain.
customer_reviews.author: Chnaane

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Rusted and chrome started feeling off. No longer send safe to use. Sub par metals.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lighter silver one to use as a salt grinder and the darker, aged silver to use as a pepper mill. They make a really cute pair! They are slightly awkward to fill and don't hold a lot, but that really doesn't bother me because they are so beautiful. They look great displayed on the kitchen counter or table and make unique conversation pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and works very well for a small grinder
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and works very well for a small grinder. It's more than adequate for home cooking and it's lovely enough for the table when company's there. It's a real find and I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mary barnhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great Spice Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully crafted grider that's all metal. No flimsy plastic to worry about and it looks nice on the table. Fits peppercorns, dried juniper berries, and other similarly sized spices. Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: barryusmc

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, and at a great price-- you could afford to buy a few of these things. Really attractive-- they look good, even in my modern kitchen. Simple but well-made-- nothing flimsy about these.
customer_reviews.author: I. Kahn Teeter-Totter

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Small, decorative and easy to use. I haven't tried to clean it yet but doubt it will need much. Lovely gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janis R. Eastin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem really grinds well! And it's adorable! After several modern one-handed poorly performing Mills that broke almost instantly, I wanted a mill that I could trust. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MCinMidway

customer_reviews.title: I like this little pepper grinder
customer_reviews.text: I like this little pepper grinder, it doesn't hold very much, but it grinds great. If the bottom attachment screwed on and off rather than just push & pull it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good little grinder
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit smaller than I thought but the listed dimensions are spot on. So far I’ve run some dry rice through it to clean it up and have run about one full load of black pepper corns. It works beautifully and looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: AZMike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and functional. They are so lovely for the price. I wanted this size for the kitchen table. The engraving is lovely. I purchased a silver and copper. Happy with both!
customer_reviews.author: MEAB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift option
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, it is beautiful. Plan on buying one for myself. Its eclectic and old world looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I bought two grinders, one is perfect, the other not. I love them though, just wish the other would grind without getting stuck so often, will use it for spices I seldom use. Beautiful to look at, appreciate the workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Arabian nights for your special dinner!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of my little grinder! I love all things that are unexpected, or out of the ordinary, and it fits that niche perfectly! Why have an ordinary utilitarian black grinder when you can have one that looks like something out of a fairy tale? Can't wait to use it for dinner guests! Thank you! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Nice small grinder
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little grinder. Works well. Not for real big cooking jobs but nice for day to day.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful spice grinder!
customer_reviews.text: These grinders are so beautiful, I really love them! Be aware, however, that they are not a pepper mill or salt mill. They are grinders for all those things and more, but you'll have to remove the bottom cover to get to the ground product after grinding. They add beauty to my kitchen and they made great gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: These Grinders are Amazing and exotic!!
customer_reviews.text: These grinders that. One all the way from Turkey are so amazing!!... I have bought st least 8 of them to give as exotic gifts... and the grind everything perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im was pleasantly surprised when i received my grinder, for the price i figured it would be basic and cheep. But i was wrong, its heavy and works great im buying more for gifts..
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and exotic
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful and exotic looking just as pictured. I have only used a few times so far, but it works very well. A very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Schipmom

customer_reviews.title: Turkish grinder
customer_reviews.text: This spice grinder is a Christmas gift. It is very attractive and looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Chanin

customer_reviews.title: Seems sufficient
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and it works on whole allspice. Not too sure it would be convenient for large amounts, but it works per recipe.
customer_reviews.author: C. and P. Horn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grinder, solid construction, and beautiful for the house. Easy to clean and a wonderful investment. A+++
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good look but bad function
customer_reviews.text: look good but not the function. I want to return but was asked to pay for the shipping so I decided to keep it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, small and difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is quite small and difficult to use, especially when the bottom bulb-shaped catch is removed. It finds salt ok, but it's a fight to grind pepper. Also, the little slot door where you fill it comes open quite easily making the contents spill out into your food. Overall cheap quality and I don't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: SEOMike

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it better for spice
customer_reviews.text: Handle can't be disconnected without plier. By default it not grinds coffee beans at all. Maybe it better for spice.
customer_reviews.author: Artur Kyryliuk

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it. Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed. I really liked it. Inexpensive.Very easy to handle it and very easy to clean it
customer_reviews.author: Omar Sandia

customer_reviews.title: The construction is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two spice grinders. I have used one of them to grind cumin seeds. I use a small funnel to put seeds into the grinder, for the opening is rather small. The construction is sturdy and well made, as well as decorative. Over all, I am happy with the purchase from Bazaaranatolia. I have been offered a free grinder for this review; However, my review is reflective of my true findings.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: but it still looks fantastic and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's much harder to grind salt than I expected, but it still looks fantastic and does the job. I tend to grind up a bunch and leave it stored in the bottom carafe area, and pinch what I need when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M.

customer_reviews.title: The picture on the Internet looks very nice. It also looks big
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the Internet looks very nice. It also looks big. In reality it's very small it doesn't even fit a small teaspoon of salt or pepper if that. Too much money for almost getting nothing. I would've returned if it wasn't too much trouble to go through.
customer_reviews.author: Mora

customer_reviews.title: Must watch the video. Link is provided in package.
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this as soon as it arrived for Himalayan salt. It didn't seem to work well. I have since seen on a video for the product that there is a nut that can be adjusted. I have changed my salt to a dried spice and it's now perfect. It's small but so cute. And detailed print.
customer_reviews.author: BarbieHoo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful, so nice to look at. CAN NOT GET IT OPEN TO FILL.☹️
customer_reviews.author: N. W. Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: We received our grinder after 3 weeks which is understandable since it ships from Turkey. It is a very nice product for the price, well constructed and very sturdy, The only problem I had was that the bottom part where the spices gather after you grind it is very hard to open for me. Other than that I recommended this product for my family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Mabrouk

customer_reviews.title: THIS SALT, SPICE GRINDER DOESNT WORK WELL AT ALL ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS SALT, SPICE GRINDER DOESNT WORK WELL AT ALL! DON'T BUY IT! SARAH WURM ROSSI
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wurm Rossi

customer_reviews.title: We ordered copper and got a silver finish. Also ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered copper and got a silver finish. Also no instructions and it was hard to figure out how to open it. Grinds OK.
customer_reviews.author: bob
